name: Raleigh-Durham International Airport - RDU - Complete Airport Tour
description:
UPDATE 5/6/2022 ***Spirit now flies out of Terminal 1*** (thanks, @StefenScotten!)

Thanks for joining me on this complete airport tour of Raleigh-Durham International Airport, now in 4K! Today's tour covers one of the busiest and most modern airports in the Carolinas, whose two terminals offer comprehensive service to nearly fifty destinations around the US and internationally. RDU proves that investing in the future pays off now!

Check the times below to jump to the area you need!

00:00 - Intro
01:00 - Terminal 1 (Southwest, Spirit)
02:00 - Transit between Terminals 1 and 2
02:30 - Terminal 2 Overview
03:10 - Fun Puzzle! Check the comments below!
03:30 - Terminal 2 Security and Airside
04:00 - Delta
04:50 - American
05:30 - United
05:55 - JetBlue
06:25 - Air Canada/Alaska
06:40 - Frontier
07:00 - Sun Country
07:20 - Terminal 2 Airside
07:50 - Airline Lounges
08:00 - Arrival & Baggage Claim
08:20 - Ground Transportation (Check if you're renting a car!)
09:00 - Summation

I try to cover what I can in a ten-minute video, but I'm sure there are things I've missed; please leave a comment below if you have questions about the tour or navigating the airport, and I'll do my best to answer them! Or, share your own thoughts and experiences about RDU!

Finally, let me know where you'd like to see next! Now that I've been vaccinated, I'm able to travel with more confidence. Stay tuned for new flight and airport videos every two weeks!

The contents of this video and its production are not endorsed by any entity portrayed therein, and none of the entities provided any input or compensation in the production of this video.

If you'd like to speak with me directly about the contents of this video or my channel, you can reach me at milesbyfoot at gmail.com.

Thumbnail by my artist wife, Beth!

IG: bethmclain.art
Twitter: Marshmallowbat

Thanks again for watching, and keep moving forward!

#airport #airporttour #aviation #travel #rdu #raleigh 

_______________________________________

FeiyuTech G6 Gimbal
Clip Studio Paint
